pre_conversation.line: Jackie Welles: You're wastin' your lives, followin' us around like dogs.
Johnny Silverhand: Get over here, man. Fuck this band. Not your crowd, not your noise, do your own thing.
Johnny Silverhand: Love it when you're mad. Gets my southern blood pumpin'.
Johnny Silverhand: Sons of bitches.
Johnny Silverhand: Get the payload on the elevator, arm it, let gravity do its thing. Explosion rocks the foundation, tower crumbles - chaos, screaming, roll credits.
Johnny Silverhand: Hilarious. You gonna help or not?
Johnny Silverhand: Gonna give good cop over there a chance to say something? C'mooon…
Johnny Silverhand: Hot damn - done and gone.
Johnny Silverhand: To bring an end to the madness you wreak.
Johnny Silverhand: Gotta get out of here, understand? And I kill anyone who gets in my way. You included.
Johnny Silverhand: Need a smoke. Where'd you stash yours?
Johnny Silverhand: How the fuck should I know? The fuck kinda joytoy are you s'posed to be?
Johnny Silverhand: Fucking chip… Rip the thing out myself!

Johnny Silverhand: Stick some iron in your mouth and pull the trigger. I can feel it… our minds… touching… I'm like mold on fruit… creepin' into you… nothing I can do about it. You hear me?! I'd puke if I fuckin' could! It's just a copy of the engram - I'm out there somewhere, gotta be…

Johnny Silverhand: Zapper-dumples and filth. In some ways, Night City never changes. Arasaka's still a despotic machine and the world's on a collision course with chaos. But hey, at least Rogue's still alive.
Johnny Silverhand: I've processed some shit, changed my mind. Don't want you dead anymore.

Johnny Silverhand: Hey, wasn't easy for me, either. You woke up in a landfill, I woke up in your head. Wrestling with your thoughts, memories. Think we're even. And I've taken a step back, looked at things… Think we might be able to help each other. We could start with Rogue. Her and I go back to the stone age.
Johnny Silverhand: Trust me. Don't trust me. I don't give a fuck. It's the least of our worries anyway.
Johnny Silverhand: Johnny Silverhand died a legend. Nobody forgets that.
Johnny Silverhand: Rogue'll dance to any tune I play her. Just get us to the Afterlife.
Johnny Silverhand: Every corp plays dirty, 'cept the streets are more than that - they're filth. So the corp leave it to the gangs. Sults’ collars'd get soiled. Surprised?
Johnny Silverhand: Not every day a half brain-dead dude drugs me around a cathouse on a wild whore chase. So, havin' a grand ol' time.
Johnny Silverhand: Little something called intuition, V. Ever heard of it?
Johnny Silverhand: I'm sorry, she finally say anything useful? Fuck the menu, let's ditch this waitress and take our special order to the chef, point-blank.
Johnny Silverhand: Meaning you go in as a customer, keep a low profile. They wanna keep their cards close? Fine. We'll play our own game.
Johnny Silverhand: Only two willin' to spread their legs for you? Sad.
Johnny Silverhand: Well, client wasn't the one who flew off the handle. Something bit her in the ass. What do you think? Cyberpsychosis?

Johnny Silverhand: As establishments fucked sideways go, this one takes the whole damn pie. Hear that? He better keep this short and sweet. Two browshed sex zombies in a single day is too much, even for me.
Johnny Silverhand: A ripper named Fingers, in a back alley for hookers… sounds like a joytoy's wet dream.
Johnny Silverhand: And you're a walkin’ corpse. Should just wait till your mind shrivels to nothing and frees up space for me.
Johnny Silverhand: OK, basics. If you're jacked in, cruisin' the Net, Arasaka can use Soulkiller, an AI, to trap, fry and pack away your psyche, your mind and your soul. Followin' so far?

Johnny Silverhand: OK… Seems we got a few more things to broach than I thought, but that'll come later. Anyway, when Soulkiller fries, roasts and boils you, you die. But the contents of your mind get copied to an engram first.
Johnny Silverhand: Won't lie - place has a wicked vibe.

Johnny Silverhand: Blue, huh? Probably a cefabricol derivative. Preem rot. Veins were poppin' with it during the Third Corporate. Sounds like paradise. Twenty-four hours you feel no pain and barely remember a thing afterwards.
Johnny Silverhand: Aahhhh… finally something better than exhaust and the stench of the city. Don't tell me you don't feel it, too. We goin’ in?
Johnny Silverhand: Fuck, V… I been dead the last half century. Sorry if I'm unable to hand you all the answers on a chrome fucking plotter when you snap your fingers.
Johnny Silverhand: Ugh, just find us that juju wirehead, OK?
Johnny Silverhand: All these years… It's really her. Fuckin’ Rogue, just kickin' it back on at the Afterlife.
Johnny Silverhand: Don't mess with 'er. She's got MR-eyes. See right through you. Give 'er the truth.
Johnny Silverhand: Good fuckin' riddance. One Arasaka whackjob is already plenty.
Johnny Silverhand: Another voice in your head. Just what the ripperdoc ordered.
Johnny Silverhand: The netpig was right. Voodoos were blowin' smoke. Soon as you gave 'em access to the Netwatch web, they roasted all the agents. And you.

Johnny Silverhand: Christ, hope not Fuckin' cultists made you their kamikaze bitch. Who'd take a job from us spooky ass Voodoo Boys? Placide took you for pathetic gutter trash, someone who no one's ever gonna come lookin' for.
Johnny Silverhand: But I'm the only one with a vision. So unless you got a better one, like I said - Go Fuck. Your. Self.
Johnny Silverhand: Things were swimmin’… What, change your mind? Eats at my gut. 'Cause you knew what you were signin' up for.
Johnny Silverhand: Uh-huh, I get it! Like to fix your men, huh? Not the first to try, believe me.
Johnny Silverhand: Mh. You're afraid. You and Kerry both - cowards. I alone have the balls to stand up to Arasaka. And boy, that terrifies you - all of you.
Johnny Silverhand: You're confused. We came here to fuck each other's brains out, not analyze mine. Think we're done for the day, so you can fuck off.
Johnny Silverhand: That this meant something? That we're close? So close you can give me shit about everything I do? Got quite the imagination, then.
Johnny Silverhand: So… what're you after? Chasin' down a story? Fresh for the screamsheets? That why you scrape me up off the pavement?
Johnny Silverhand: So? One of how many? No. Only link to Arasaka is the fact that Johnny Silverhand's boning her.

Johnny Silverhand: Guy was a vulture. Out to use Alt from the start. When Arasaka flatlined 'er, man, for him that was sprinkles... with a cherry on top. Fuck, he woulda killed 'er himself if they hadn't just for his cockrot story.
Johnny Silverhand: Don't you fuckin' mention Alt. Shit, you must've been watching some other flick! I took down Arasaka-fuckin'-Tower for her!

Johnny Silverhand: Oh, they tried, believe me. But their tiny corporate brains can't handle a free AI that knows how people think. They were busy looking for her in the Crystal Palace, while she was building the Ghost City for Kang Tao.
Johnny Silverhand: Why the fuck isn't it? You created Soulkiller. You handed Arasaka a fuckin’ super weapon that dismantled me, you and half the runners in Night City.
